front.title: FYI on Questions and Answers - Answers to Commonly Asked "Primary and Secondary School Internet User" Questions

abstract.t: The goal of this FYI RFC is to document the questions most commonly asked about the Internet by those in the primary and secondary school community, and to provide pointers to sources which answer those questions. This memo provides information for the Internet community. This memo does not specify an Internet standard of any kind. [FYI 22]
